programme.title: Малыши
programme.desc: В параллельном мире живут такие странные создания которые называют себя малышами, они не совсем похожи на человеческих детей потому что больше напоминают животных. Среди них есть зебра, лев, лягушка и другие животные, у них у каждого свой индивидуальный характер и поэтому она частенько ссорятся потому что не сходятся во мнениях. Но когда они перестают ругаться то начинаются самые увлекательные и захватывающие приключения которые только можно придумать. Эти малыши иногда заглядывают и к нам в мир чтобы позвать нас вместе с ними прогуляться по загадочным лугам и просто весело провести время.

programme.title: Приключения дельфиненка
programme.desc: Милый и добрый дельфиненок Муму живет на маленьком необитаемом острове, на который, время от времени, попадают разные смешные животные, которые становятся его друзьями. В гостях у Муму побывают модный краб и юная тюлениха, рыба-прилипала и электрическая птица, огромная раковина и многие другие. Это очень добрые и талантливые истории, сделанные с помощью самых современных средств 3D анимации, для самых маленьких и не только.

programme.title: Приключения дельфиненка
programme.desc: Милый и добрый дельфиненок Муму живет на маленьком необитаемом острове, на который, время от времени, попадают разные смешные животные, которые становятся его друзьями. programme.title: Малыши
programme.desc: В параллельном мире живут такие странные создания которые называют себя малышами, они не совсем похожи на человеческих детей потому что больше напоминают животных. programme.title: Малыши Юрского периода
programme.desc: Интересный и насыщенный красками мультипликационный сериал. Компания из нескольких маленьких динозавров потерялась и теперь путешествует по временным пространствам на волшебном черном метеорите, который когда-то упал на землю. Они ищут своих родителей и готовы совершать любые поступки, лишь бы отыскать их. Эпохи меняются, динозаврики постоянно попадают в различные интересные приключения. Единственная мечта маленьких героев – обрести настоящую семью. Поможет ли им метеорит осуществить такое заветное желание. Если есть сила и невероятное желание – возможно все. Ни смена времен и эпох, ни природные катаклизмы не помешают динозаврикам обрести семью. Мультсериал очень легкий и непринужденно воспринимается зрителями. Отлично подходит для проведения досуга в семейном кругу. В восторге будут и маленькие зрители и их родители.

programme.title: Весёлый грузовичок Олли
programme.desc: Олли — маленький веселый грузовичок, который только начинает познавать мир. По повадкам он очень похож на задорного любознательного щенка. Вместе со своими друзьями Олли нередко оказывается в переделках, решает непростые задачки, а также растет и развивается с юным зрителем.

programme.title: Крошка Милтон
programme.desc: Крошка Милтон и в самом деле очень маленький. Он живет в часах, стоящих на каминной полке в гостиной. О существовании Милтона не знает никто, кроме его лучшего друга Дугласа — огромного лохматого пса, который целый день дремлет перед камином или спасает Милтона от многочисленных опасностей.

Lielas un mazas radības. Britu seriāls (oriģinālvalodas izvēle)
Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim & Fuzz head to Suffolk to rescue a charismatic but very worn out 1928 Austin 12/4. Owner Graham had a dream of spending his retirement pottering about in "Gusty" and thanks to Car SOS, he will. Thats as long as Tim & Fuzz can overcome the problems of repairing this fragile and rather rare car. From the start it is obvious all the perishable parts need replacing but its the engine that gives the boys the runaround. On top of that, the boys struggle to agree on Fuzzs idea of an "oily rag" restoration, a suggestion that leaves Tim scratching his head. Finally the reveal day arrives and hands Tim the chance to try his cheekiest ever way of handing the unsuspecting owner his car back.

programme.title: 1989: The Year That Made Us
programme.desc: What do Bart Simpson, Batman and the Little Mermaid have in common? They all became huge stars in 1989, a year that shaped Hollywood as we know it today. In this episode of Nat Geo's 6-part series, television ad film icons James Brooks and Peter Guber peel back the curtain on the world of entertainment. They reveal how the overnight success of these three characters turned the old show business into the multifaceted modern industry it is today.

programme.title: 1989: The Year That Made Us
programme.desc: Chuck D and Arsenio Hall discuss the pop culture revolution of 1989 that raised our collective social consciousness. Spike Lee's powerful film Do the Right Thing made a lasting impact, Public Enemy's provocative lyrics transformed Hip Hop and Arsenio Hall created a platform for a generation of stars previously ignored by late night TV. The cultural and political events of the year helped awaken mainstream audiences to the black experience.

programme.title: World's Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: World's Toughest Fixes is going to new heights … tackling fixes that can't be reached by ladder, lift or crane. From the top of the Hoover Dam … to the cliffs near Niagara Falls … Riley's going to join the workers who take on the ultimate death-defying jobs. He'll help replace an old shock absorber way out over the edge of Las Vegas's tallest building … patch a turbine blade hundreds of feet above the ground … and clear away rocks on a cliff face that overlooks the one of the world's most famous falls. One thing's for sure – working at such extreme heights will give Riley a new appreciation for standing on solid ground.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: Wicked Tuna is a reality TV series revolving around commercial tuna fishermen based in Gloucester, Massachusetts. They fish for the lucrative Atlantic bluefin tuna in the North Atlantic Ocean. The teams of fishermen battle each other to see who can get more fish and therefore higher profit out of catching the fish. Take a deeper look at the fisheries and the hardships that these fishermen have to go through in order to make a living.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: What would we find if we pulled the plug on our seas and oceans? This remarkable documentary series from the National Geographic Channel explores unseen seabeds to uncover the mysteries behind sunken vessels and long-lost ships. Using computer generated maps of the ocean floor, the team of scientists probe these unknown waters hoping to find some of history's missing ships and treasures. From lost cities to pirate ships, military vessels to relics from a different time, the team hope to understand more about how these legends were lost to the deep, dark depths.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is a whacky British science show that looks at some of the most watched videos on the internet and explains the science behind them. Initially hosted by Top Gear's Richard Hammond, and later by Dallas Campbell, this National Geographic is a comedic gem. With the first series airing episodes titled Cannon Ball Ice Dude, Learning to Fly, Jet Pack Failure and Dancing Disaster, you can guarantee that this is one of the most ridiculous shows on television. What more could you want?

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is a whacky British science show that looks at some of the most watched videos on the internet and explains the science behind them. What more could you want?

programme.title: Danger Decoded
programme.desc: Danger Decoded is a German documentary series that was originally broadcast on the National Geographic Channel.The television series is all about the clips of real life disaster that have been caught on camera. In this intense, nerve wracking we will be seeing real people face real life distaste. From helicopters going down to a sky jumping going terrible wrong. the point of the series is to see if you as a view can detect where the people on video went wrong.

programme.title: Danger Decoded
programme.desc: Danger Decoded is a German documentary series that was originally broadcast on the National Geographic Channel.The television series is all about the clips of real life disaster that have been caught on camera. programme.title: Alien Deep with Bob Ballard
programme.desc: Oceanographer Dr. Robert Ballard is on a global quest to unravel one of the world's biggest mysteries – where life on Earth began. Ballard suspects life may have gotten started where hot rock and water collide in one of the world's most seemingly hostile environments – active volcanoes deep within the ocean. He tracks teams of scientists as they deploy robotic submersibles at deep sea volcanic rifts across the world's oceans, points his own ship to a dangerous undersea volcano in the Mediterranean, and hunts for answers amid hissing sulfur vents in Iceland and bubbling beakers at a NASA laboratory. Could the seething geologic heart of our planet actually have given birth to life on Earth?

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: In the south, Bjørn gets both work and frustration from nature, when he first have to help a car with frozen fuel, and then the road closes because of when reindeers which is close to extinction is hanging out close to the road. Thord works as a maniac to keep the trucks moving and the road open. In the north, they have to save a truck with fish, a tractor in a house and a dumper that has lost his back axle in steep and icy hills.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Among the depths of the Norwegian mountains, terrifying conditions are camouflaged by the stunningly icy landscape. Who would have thought the fluffy blanket of snow could be so dangerous? Luckily for you, if you happen to become stuck in such conditions, a brave troupe of rescue workers will come to your aid. Pulling cars and trucks out of the worst of situations, Thord and his pals fight against the weather to keep the mountains as safe as possible. Whether it's a fatal accident, a vehicle stuck in the snow, or even catching smugglers in the act, on some of the most dangerous roads in Europe, it's a blessing to know you can rely on the rescue team to help you out.

programme.title: Machine Impossible
programme.desc: This time on Machine Impossible, Max McMurdo and Mischa Pollack go on a global road trip to discover whether machines really are better, smarter and stronger than human beings. They'll go head-to-head with some of the most intelligent and versatile robots on earth. They'll also take on a search and destroy robot in a thrilling game of paintball. Can Team Man beat Team Machine? Or will Max and Mischa be terminated?

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: Three new Captains arrive in Gloucester with one goal -- to defeat the local fleet. But they have their work cut out for them challenging the battle-proven Gloucester captains. Five-time champion Captain Dave Carraro of FV-Tuna.com feels the pressure as he fights to win another title, and the Gloucester captains and crews rally withand againsthim for bragging rights to their turf. In a fast-paced season, the brawl for bluefin comes down to the final fish, and a stunning finish for the seasons victor.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: Wicked Tuna is a reality TV series revolving around commercial tuna fishermen based in Gloucester, Massachusetts. They fish for the lucrative Atlantic bluefin tuna in the North Atlantic Ocean. The teams of fishermen battle each other to see who can get more fish and therefore higher profit out of catching the fish. Take a deeper look at the fisheries and the hardships that these fishermen have to go through in order to make a living.

programme.title: Cosmos: Possible Worlds
programme.desc: The human understanding of the universe is very limited but there is one man who believes that our future is greater than anyone thought possible. Neil deGrasse Tyson explores how we could look at space and space travel in the near and distant future, discussing our discovery of the laws of nature and how to find our exact coordinates in the universe. From our own planet we will take a journey through our solar system, galaxy and beyond to seek answers as to whether human habitation is possible on other planets and if there is, possibly, intelligent alien life already out there. The Cosmos is vast and holds endless answers yet even more questions. Asking those questions is only the beginning. Documentary series.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Has God been cut out of our modern lives? Or are there moments when His presence breaks through? Morgan goes on a quest to find those people who are convinced they have proof of God. Morgan meets a survivor of 9/11, who found God amid the rubble of the Twin Towers, and Ifa practitioners who use the sacred art of divination. The journey to find the divine takes us to the Namibian desert to witness the healing ritual of the San and to the convergence of nature and science to discover God's existence is somewhere between knowledge and doubt.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: A fascinating documentary series from National Geographic exploring Europe from above. Although only the second-smallest continent on our planet, Europe is packed full of diverse wildlife, cities, countries, politics and history. From this unique perspective, viewers can see the culturally rich continent like they never have before, with cameras in the sky offering a stunning examination of these beautiful lands. Each episode in this six-part series focusses on a respective country, with those explored in this series being the Netherlands, Italy, Germany, Spain, the United Kingdom and Poland. Narrated by Julian Barratt.

programme.title: Undercover History Updates
programme.desc: Compelling documentary series that examines some of the world's most famous mysteries, using latest discoveries. Some of them will finally be solved, and some will raise more questions then ever before. Did the police catch infamous Boston Strangler, or is he still walking the streets today? Will modern forensics and DNA analysis help solve the mystery of a famous hijacker Dan Cooper? Will we find out what happened with the Romanovs as forensic scientists attempt to identify remains that were discovered near the possible murder site? Find out in this extraordinary series.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: Wicked Tuna is a reality TV series revolving around commercial tuna fishermen based in Gloucester, Massachusetts. They fish for the lucrative Atlantic bluefin tuna in the North Atlantic Ocean. The teams of fishermen battle each other to see who can get more fish and therefore higher profit out of catching the fish. Take a deeper look at the fisheries and the hardships that these fishermen have to go through in order to make a living.

programme.title: Airport Security: First Class
programme.desc: The biggest cocaine busts from Airport Security Colombia and Peru. A man traveling to the DR, hides cocaine in children's organizers. A stepmom and daughter conceal bricks of cocaine inside jackets. A mother with a child carries cocaine in food packages and kid's clothes. The Anti-narcotics police find cocaine in a shipment of fresh herbs. A man going to Mexico with cocaine bricks in his carry-on. A man with liquid cocaine in beverage bottles.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: After an injury, Greg Williams' happy life falls apart. He decides to volunteer as a missionary in the Philippines, but finds danger instead when he is kidnapped by a violent local group. A mother and son also head to the Philippines to visit family, but find themselves kidnapped by the same group. When their ransom is paid but only the mother is released, her 14-year-old son must wait in captivity for an opportunity to escape.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they don't happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they don't happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Alaska: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The next generation of Alaskans play by their own rules, rebelling against society norms and surviving Arctic climates. Michael Manzo travels nomadically in search of opportunity. Alex Javor leaves life in Virginia behind to build his dream cabin. The Rowlands instill critical lessons of survival to their children. And Brent and Ida work 24/7 on their business while navigating life as a new couple.

programme.title: Alaska: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The next generation of Alaskans play by their own rules, rebelling against society norms and surviving Arctic climates. Michael Manzo travels nomadically in search of opportunity. Alex Javor leaves life in Virginia behind to build his dream cabin. The Rowlands instill critical lessons of survival to their children. And Brent and Ida work 24/7 on their business while navigating life as a new couple.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: Lawless Island is a series focusing on a group of people who have chosen a new life far away in Alaska. United by their extreme independence and love of the wild, the show's characters have left civilized way of life behind. Now they have to deal with many different things common people do not encounter in there every day routine, like hunting and stocking the freezers, fishing, farming in order to survive. It makes them realize how dependable they are on each other.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw, a car enthusiast and TV presenter teams up with master mechanic Fuzz Townshend to rescue rusty old cars and classic vehicles from their former neglected lives. People can nominate a relative or friend without them knowing if they've been unable to restore the car themselves for any reason from medical issues to financial problems. A team of experts work hard to restore the vehicles to their former glory and once they have been revamped the owner is surprised with a reunion, usually at a staged event organised by Tim Shaw.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: The band's instruments get stolen, so they hold a rummage sale to raise money to replace them. When Tomika sells a sentimental item of Summer's, she has to remember why it was so important to repair their friendship.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: Blues Clues and You is a animated live children's TV series. It has been aired in both America and the UK with various hosts including Kevin Duala, Steve Burns and Donovan Patton. Presenter hosts to his pre-school audience to join him and his animated puppy dog Blue to the Blue's Clues house. The plot of the show is that Blue leaves her paw prints and clues around various locations to figure out what she is going to do for the day. Throughout the series other characters are portrayed to help Blue and the host. Characters include Joe Steves brother, the talking mailbox, Mr Salt and Mrs Pepper and Tickety Tock.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: Josh and Blue are painting a portrait of their friends, but it's not quite finished. We play Blue's Clues to figure out who else Blue wants to add to her painting. While looking for clues we skidoo to help out our color friends!

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: Deer Squad is an animated adventure rescue series about four loveable, enthusiastic and heroic young deer friends – Kai, Lola, Rammy, and Bobbi, who protect the animals of Central Forest and the humans who inhabit Platinum City.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: A team of pups led by the energetic Ryder are always at the ready when it comes to helping out around the bustling town of Adventure Bay. They have all the tools, gadgets and gumption they need to help out their community.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Follow Ryder and his team of trusty side-pups as they try their best to help keep Adventure Bay safe from mayhem and mischief. Alongside his service pups Marshall, Rubble, Chase, Zuma, Rocky and Skye, ten-year-old Ryder proudly leads the Paw Patrol team as they confront their rivals over in the neighbouring town of Foggy Bottom. Under the watch of an arrogant Mayor Humdinger, Foggy Bottom's local crew of pesky kitties love nothing more than eating candy and stirring up a little trouble for Ryder and his friends. Lucky for the citizens of Adventure Bay, "no job is too big and no pup is too small" for the team to handle, and whether navigating sea, land or sky, these mighty pups are ready to go, go, go!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Eager to be named Kings of the Con at the Ace Savvy convention, Lincoln and Clyde convince the sisters to go with them as the Full Deck. But the girls get more attention, leading the boys to do whatever it takes to gain focus.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family? Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When Luna discovers that the high school music club will be axed due to budget cuts, she leads a protest. Desperate to play Lincoln's trash-themed video game, Lana conspires to distract her brother away from the console.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: Lego City Adventures is an American-Danish computer-animated TV series produced by The Lego Group. The series is set in the noisy sprawling LEGO City metropolis, where its down-to-earth characters live and work. Here you will meet the bravest firemen, the best policemen, the most attentive mayor and LEGO characters from all walks of life. They team up to stop a mysterious criminal, who causes troubles all around. Each LEGO City citizen can feel quite a hero and participate in the most amazing and unbelievable adventures in the city! If you find yourself there, you witness everyday incidents with a happy ending.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln is going to his first rock concert, and Luna is determined to make it the greatest experience ever. Lincoln finds a letter in the attic leading him to believe there is money hidden within the Loud house!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: The Thundermans

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. That's everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Nickelodeon the Substitute
programme.desc: Professional Skateboarder Shaun White goes undercover as The Substitute and is transformed into a side hustling entrepreneur, a free spirited fashion savant, and an uptight, "by the rules" teacher with a special skill up his sleeve.

programme.title: Side Hustle
programme.desc: Mr. Prusko is the most boring teacher in school. Students can't even stay awake in his class, so Lex and Presley make a deal to make him cooler in exchange for good grades. Only the girls do too good a job and create a monster known as "Mr. P".

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Meet The Thundermans, a typical suburban family that happens to have astounding superpowers. At the center of the action are the 14-year-old Thunderman twins, who share the same bathroom, the same school, and the same annoying little siblings. Their only difference? The sister is a super student with a super sunny disposition who super looks forward to being a superhero someday, and her twin brother is a super villain.

programme.title: Mājā un sētā
programme.desc: 2.sezona, 23.epizode. Ar padomiem, pieredzes stāstiem gan lauciniekiem, gan pilsētniekiem, ikvienam, kuram ir interese par dārza darbiem un savas dzīves vides uzlabošanu. Šajā sezonā akcentēsim zaļo dzīvesveidu, kā dzīvot veselīgāk, saimniekot taupīgāk un videi draudzīgāk. Un tā kā vēl kādu laiku nāksies sadzīvot ar koronavīrusa klātbūtni, meklēsim interesantas, mazāk zināmas atpūtas vietas laukos. Un neizpaliks arī padomi, kā parūpēties par mūsu mīļdzīvniekiem.

programme.title: Nauda runā
programme.desc: 1.epizode. Nauda runā. Un tā runā skaļi jaunajā reģionālajā reformā. Kā finansējums sasniedz pašvaldības; cik lietderīgi to tērē un kā labot kļūdas, kas izgaismojas jau tagad – nedaudz vairāk kā mēnesi kopš reformas stāšanās spēkā? Un kā politika un politiķi ietekmē to, kas notiek pašvaldībās. Profesors Arnis Sauka ReTV raidījumā "Nauda runā" sarunāsies ar atbildīgo ministru Artūru Tomu Plešu, politologu, LU sociālo zinātņu fakultātes dekānu Jāni Ikstenu un ekonomistu, karšu izdevniecības Jāņa sēta galveno redaktoru Jāni Turlo

programme.title: Pipars cepās
programme.desc: 15.epizode. Grila sezona uzņem apgriezienus un aizvien vairāk cilvēku plāno nedēļas nogalēs pagatavot ko īpašu. Kas gan var būt kārdinošāks par grilēta ēdiena smaržu, kas virmo gaisā? Ikdienišķa maltīte kļūs par svētkiem, ja to pārvērtīsiet kopīgā grilēšanas pasākumā dārzā, piemājas terasē vai pie dabas krūts.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas 21.00
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos – ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Kad motori rūc
programme.desc: Satiksmes jaunumi.

programme.title: Jumts
programme.desc: "Jumts" ir dokumentālā filma 2 daļās par lielāko pierādīto un iztiesāto naudas atmazgāšanu 2000.gadu sākumā. Filmas autors Ansis Pūpols

programme.title: Jautā – Jums
programme.desc: Atkārtojums. Raidījumu "Jautā-Jums" skaties katru darba dienu plkst. 16.00. Raidījumu vada Lauris Kļaviņš.

programme.title: Pipars cepās
programme.desc: 15.epizode. Grila sezona uzņem apgriezienus un aizvien vairāk cilvēku plāno nedēļas nogalēs pagatavot ko īpašu. Kas gan var būt kārdinošāks par grilēta ēdiena smaržu, kas virmo gaisā? Ikdienišķa maltīte kļūs par svētkiem, ja to pārvērtīsiet kopīgā grilēšanas pasākumā dārzā, piemājas terasē vai pie dabas krūts.

programme.title: Брат за брата
programme.desc: Такие кварталы, как Гарлем, раньше можно было увидеть только в голливудских боевиках. Никто не думал, что они могут появиться и у нас. Гарлем – настоящее гетто в одном из крупных российских городов. Здесь почти открыто торгуют наркотиками и перепродают краденое. Школьные учителя боятся своих учеников, ведь те способны убить за плохую оценку. Местные стражи правопорядка не рискуют в позднее время суток лишний раз появляться на его улицах, а жители так привыкли к установленным правилам игры, что кажется, ничто и никогда не сможет заставить их иначе смотреть на происходящее вокруг.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Самые шокирующие гипотезы" – документальный проект телеканала РЕН ТВ. Мы дадим новые ответы на старые вопросы и зададим свои. Факты, о которых долго молчали наши коллеги-журналисты и независимая оценка событий, изменивших мир; расследования самых сенсационных историй и свежий взгляд на, казалось бы, общеизвестные исторические факты; поиск закономерностей и параллелей в самых невероятных явлениях нашей жизни, новости из всех областей человеческих знаний и загадки потаённых уголков нашего подсознания. Всё, что вас так долго интересовало, и всё, что может коснуться каждого из нас.

programme.title: Шефы
programme.desc: Мини-сериал рассказывает о шеф-поваре знаменитого французского заведения, готовом пойти на всё ради спасения собственного ресторана. А также, о его отношениях с другими людьми, в полностью неполиткорректном мире…

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Самые шокирующие гипотезы" – документальный проект телеканала РЕН ТВ. Мы дадим новые ответы на старые вопросы и зададим свои. Факты, о которых долго молчали наши коллеги-журналисты и независимая оценка событий, изменивших мир; расследования самых сенсационных историй и свежий взгляд на, казалось бы, общеизвестные исторические факты; поиск закономерностей и параллелей в самых невероятных явлениях нашей жизни, новости из всех областей человеческих знаний и загадки потаённых уголков нашего подсознания. Всё, что вас так долго интересовало, и всё, что может коснуться каждого из нас.

programme.title: Когда мы дома
programme.desc: Об эволюции семейных отношений – от начала совместной жизни и до старости. Главные герои – пять украинских семейных пар разного возраста и степени развития отношений, которые не знакомы между собой. События в комедийном сериале разворачиваются в стенах квартир, в которых проживают пары, и построены на коротких историях из семейной жизни.

programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Курортный роман
programme.desc: Это документальный сериал с элементами реалити об обычных людях, с которыми во время отдыха произошло интересное знакомство, полностью изменившее их жизнь. Курортные романы, неожиданные встречи со старыми знакомыми, супружеские измены, подставы и поиски настоящей, истинной любви на морском берегу под лучами обжигающего солнца! Стоит ли заводить курортные романы, или лучше от них воздержаться?

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Персонажами шоу становятся обычные врачи и больные, ГАИшники и нарушители, родители и дети, полицейские и хулиганы, пилоты и стюардессы, офисные работники и даже стриптизёрши.

programme.title: Морские дьяволы. Смерч
programme.desc: Их называют "морскими дьяволами", хотя по праву их можно считать рыцарями трех стихий: они действуют на земле, в воде и в воздухе. Захватывающий боевик "Морские дьяволы" посвящен спецназовцам ВМФ России, всем боевым пловцам — тем, кто является элитой наших вооруженных сил. Все имена и боевые псевдонимы в сериале вымышлены, отряд под таким названием никогда не существовал, но такие подразделения существуют на самом деле, и их подвигами страна вправе гордиться!

programme.title: Морские дьяволы. Смерч
programme.desc: Их называют "морскими дьяволами", хотя по праву их можно считать рыцарями трех стихий: они действуют на земле, в воде и в воздухе. Захватывающий боевик "Морские дьяволы" посвящен спецназовцам ВМФ России, всем боевым пловцам — тем, кто является элитой наших вооруженных сил. Все имена и боевые псевдонимы в сериале вымышлены, отряд под таким названием никогда не существовал, но такие подразделения существуют на самом деле, и их подвигами страна вправе гордиться!

programme.title: Детективы
programme.desc: Два полицейских в отставке открывают частное детективное агентство... Майоры полиции Игорь Лукин и Алексей Насонов вышли в отставку, но не собираются сидеть без дела. Они открывают частное детективное агентство "Детективы" и берутся за дела тех, кто по разным причинам не хочет обращаться в полицию… Опыт и профессиональные навыки Лукина и Насонова позволяют им с одинаковым успехом и решать семейные конфликты, и раскрывать уголовные преступления.

programme.title: Береговая охрана
programme.desc: рассказывает о жизни пограничного российского городка и непростой службе офицеров Береговой охраны ФСБ РФ. Андрей Васильков по распределению прибывает в Ушаков. Позади – пять лет в военно-морском институте, впереди – служба в береговой охране. Но вместо ожидаемых Васильковым романтики, приключений, опасностей и пороха, он получил каждодневную рутину. А еще – излишнюю самоуверенность, разгильдяйство, предательства, разочарования, настоящую мужскую дружбу, любовь к женщине, подвиги, героизм, взросление… И, как выяснилось, любовь к Родине. Потому что "есть такая профессия – Родину защищать".

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Detention Adventure
programme.desc: With a similar premise to The Goonies and The Breakfast Club, Detention Adventure follows three nerdy friends and the school bully, who repeatedly get themselves thrown in detention. However, they have good reason to do this as they are trying to find the entrance to a secret maze of tunnels filled with hidden traps that protect the legendary laboratory of Alexander Graham Bell. Raign (Simone Miller), Joy (Alina Prijono), and Hulk (Jack Fulton) are the three whip-smart geeks who discover an old textbook which points them to Bell's lab, conveniently hidden beneath their school. The school bully, Brett (Tomaso Sanelli) a detention regular, soons joins them as they use all of their attributes to try to navigate through the labyrinth and find hidden passageways to lead them to their goal.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: History Hunters documentary series let young viewers explore past civilizations and cultures, their heritage and its influence on future generations. It is a fun way for both parents and kids to learn history and discover its mysterious facts and events. Various chapters of history are there for you: from exploration of Vikings, including their myths, alphabet and foods, to the Mayan civilization, the culture of Europe's wide-ranging clans of Celts and life in the islands in the Pacific Ocean known collectively as Polynesia, and much more.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler is an American television personality, author, science teacher and the host of Xploration DIY SCI show. Each episode is about a certain science concept strengthened by science experiments, so that theory and practice are integrated. Steve conducts his fun experiments using everyday items everybody can get, so anyone can be a scientist. Watch, have fun and learn about the power of pressure, power of gas, laws of inertia, how to make elephant toothpaste at home and much more.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Deadly Pole to Pole
programme.desc: Deadly Pole to Pole is a documentary series hosted by Steve Backshall, who travels pole to pole through the Americas while looking for the most dangerous animals. Join Steve and his deadliest adventure- 14-month voyage from the Arctic to the Antarctic via Alaska, California, Hawaii, Mexico and Brazil and many more amazing locations. Have a look at his meetings with white whales, ice bears, sharks, eagles, wolves, sea lions, eagles, crocodiles, snakes and spiders.

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Baby Animals
programme.desc: Arctic foxes, sea otters, tamarin monkeys and red pandas are just some of the tiniest, cutest creatures featured in Baby Animals. With their big eyes and wobbly first steps, nature's newbies are irresistible. Watch how animals nurture their young as infant elephants, baby bison and rambunctious rhinos all eat, sleep and play their way to adulthood. Cuddly, clumsy and full of mischief, the babies of the animal kingdom certainly make up the wildest daycare you've ever seen.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Detention Adventure
programme.desc: With a similar premise to The Goonies and The Breakfast Club, Detention Adventure follows three nerdy friends and the school bully, who repeatedly get themselves thrown in detention. However, they have good reason to do this as they are trying to find the entrance to a secret maze of tunnels filled with hidden traps that protect the legendary laboratory of Alexander Graham Bell. Raign (Simone Miller), Joy (Alina Prijono), and Hulk (Jack Fulton) are the three whip-smart geeks who discover an old textbook which points them to Bell's lab, conveniently hidden beneath their school. The school bully, Brett (Tomaso Sanelli) a detention regular, soons joins them as they use all of their attributes to try to navigate through the labyrinth and find hidden passageways to lead them to their goal.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler is an American television personality, author, science teacher and the host of Xploration DIY SCI show. Each episode is about a certain science concept strengthened by science experiments, so that theory and practice are integrated. Steve conducts his fun experiments using everyday items everybody can get, so anyone can be a scientist. Watch, have fun and learn about the power of pressure, power of gas, laws of inertia, how to make elephant toothpaste at home and much more.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: Deadly Pole to Pole
programme.desc: Deadly Pole to Pole is a documentary series hosted by Steve Backshall, who travels pole to pole through the Americas while looking for the most dangerous animals. Join Steve and his deadliest adventure- 14-month voyage from the Arctic to the Antarctic via Alaska, California, Hawaii, Mexico and Brazil and many more amazing locations. Have a look at his meetings with white whales, ice bears, sharks, eagles, wolves, sea lions, eagles, crocodiles, snakes and spiders.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: History Hunters documentary series let young viewers explore past civilizations and cultures, their heritage and its influence on future generations. It is a fun way for both parents and kids to learn history and discover its mysterious facts and events. Various chapters of history are there for you: from exploration of Vikings, including their myths, alphabet and foods, to the Mayan civilization, the culture of Europe's wide-ranging clans of Celts and life in the islands in the Pacific Ocean known collectively as Polynesia, and much more.

programme.title: Baby Animals
programme.desc: Arctic foxes, sea otters, tamarin monkeys and red pandas are just some of the tiniest, cutest creatures featured in Baby Animals. With their big eyes and wobbly first steps, nature's newbies are irresistible. Watch how animals nurture their young as infant elephants, baby bison and rambunctious rhinos all eat, sleep and play their way to adulthood. Cuddly, clumsy and full of mischief, the babies of the animal kingdom certainly make up the wildest daycare you've ever seen.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!

programme.title: Катись!
programme.desc: После того, как Блисс попала в команду роллеров, она больше не пытается стать королевой красоты. Конечно, мама не в восторге от ее выбора, но Блисс непреклонна – она жаждет независимости и постигает жизнь в компании буйных сверстников, отрабатывая сложные трюки.

programme.title: Джекил и Хайд
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в Лондоне 1930-х годов, где Роберт Джекил, внук Генри Джекила, воспитанный на Цейлоне приёмными родителями, пытается узнать правду о своей настоящей семье и понять причину своих странных "приступов". По пятам за Робертом следует "Ми-И", британская спецслужба, занимающаяся паранормальными явлениями, а также агенты некоего сообщества, называемого "Тенебри".

programme.title: Крик тишины
programme.desc: Блокадный Ленинград. Февраль 1942 года. Заканчивается самая страшная блокадная зима. Зина Воронова совсем отчаялась. Ее трёхлетний сын Митя ослабел, а карточки на хлеб уже отоварены на два дня вперед. Последняя надежда – эвакуация. Но с маленькими детьми не берут. Тогда женщина идет на чудовищный шаг – эвакуируется, оставив сына одного в промерзшей квартире. Во время налета мальчика спасает девочка-подросток Катя. Девочка выдает Митю за своего брата и обещает себе сделать все, чтобы Митя выжил. Несмотря ни на что.

programme.title: Арлетт
programme.desc: Арлетт живет обычной провинциальной жизнью, без приключений и неожиданностей. Она не подозревает, что из-за наследства умершего отца, владельца крупнейших казино, она стала лакомым кусочком. Воротилы игорного бизнеса решают не упустить деньги и выдать Арлетт замуж за своего человека. Наша золушка расцветает благодаря изысканным ухаживаниям очаровательного посланца. Ее естественное и в то же время эксцентричное поведение также не оставляет его равнодушным. Чья любовь сильнее?

programme.title: 3 счастливых поросенка
programme.desc: Реми, Матьё и Кристиан — братья, чья гиперактивность доставляет массу неприятностей им самим, их ревнивым женам и подружкам. Всё только усложняется, когда Доминик, жена Реми, выставляет мужа за дверь и не прочь завести интрижку с его братом…

programme.title: Катись!
programme.desc: После того, как Блисс попала в команду роллеров, она больше не пытается стать королевой красоты. Конечно, мама не в восторге от ее выбора, но Блисс непреклонна – она жаждет независимости и постигает жизнь в компании буйных сверстников, отрабатывая сложные трюки.

programme.title: Джекил и Хайд
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в Лондоне 1930-х годов, где Роберт Джекил, внук Генри Джекила, воспитанный на Цейлоне приёмными родителями, пытается узнать правду о своей настоящей семье и понять причину своих странных "приступов". По пятам за Робертом следует "Ми-И", британская спецслужба, занимающаяся паранормальными явлениями, а также агенты некоего сообщества, называемого "Тенебри".

programme.title: Любовная страсть
programme.desc: Молодой и привлекательный Джорджо, капитан кавалерии, влюблен в замужнюю женщину Клару. Но его переводят в другой гарнизон. А там в него влюбляется больная и безобразная девушка Фоска, кузина коменданта. И эта страсть перерастает в одержимость...

programme.title: II/Два
programme.desc: 16-летние Настя, Саша и Кристина учатся вместе в десятом классе и живут обыкновенной жизнью подростков: уроки, репетиторы, походы в кино, вечеринки. В школе царит суровая дисциплина, и трудно быть не таким как все. Но однажды этот маленький мир потрясет новость, из-за которой все страхи и предрассудки вылезут наружу.

programme.title: Паразиты
programme.desc: Обычное корейское семейство Кимов жизнь не балует. Приходится жить в сыром грязном полуподвале, воровать интернет у соседей и перебиваться случайными подработками. Однажды друг сына семейства, уезжая на стажировку за границу, предлагает тому заменить его и поработать репетитором у старшеклассницы в богатой семье Пак. Подделав диплом о высшем образовании, парень отправляется в шикарный дизайнерский особняк и производит на хозяйку дома хорошее впечатление. Тут же ему в голову приходит необычный план по трудоустройству сестры.

programme.title: Топ-модель
programme.desc: В погоне за мечтой, юная Эмма покидает Данию и отправляется в Париж, чтобы попробовать свои силы в мире моды. Девушка уверена, что с ее внешними данными она сможет стать топ-моделью. Но, как и в любом бизнесе, в мире моды большая конкуренция, а искренность и доброта являются скорей недостатками, чем достоинствами. Париж сурово встречает будущую топ-модель. Впереди ее ждет тоска по любимому парню, жизнь в крохотной квартирке с соседкой Софией, которая тоже пробует пробиться в модельном бизнесе, бесконечные кастинги и знакомство с жесткими правилами мира моды.Но долго грустить Эмме не приходится, так как знакомство с фотографом Шейном Уайтом очень сильно меняет ее жизнь. Роман с успешным и знаменитым парнем открывает перед Эммой множество дверей, но девушка все больше увлекается не работой и перспективами, а Шейном. Для начинающей модели жизнь в Париже становится настоящей сказкой, ведь у нее есть работа и любимый мужчина, который способен обеспечить ее всем необходимым. Однако удача быстро перестанет улыбаться простой провинциальной девчонке, а сказка начинает превращаться в страшный сон.

programme.title: Джекил и Хайд
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в Лондоне 1930-х годов, где Роберт Джекил, внук Генри Джекила, воспитанный на Цейлоне приёмными родителями, пытается узнать правду о своей настоящей семье и понять причину своих странных "приступов". programme.title: Rūdīts ugunī
programme.desc: Bagāts Meksikas rūpnieks nolīgst bijušo CIP aģentu, lai tas aizsargātu viņa meitu. Kā izrādās, viņa bažas ir bijušas pilnīgi pamatotas.

programme.title: Lūzuma punkts
programme.desc: FIB aģents izmeklē virkni banku aplaupīšanu, kas, domājams, saistītas ar sērfotājiem. Viņš iefiltrējas sērfotāju aprindās, bet pienāk brīdis, kad jāizšķiras starp pienākumu un draudzību.

programme.title: Projekts "Zilā grāmata"
programme.desc: Astrofiziķis Dr. J Alens Haineks ir pieņemts darbā kādā slepenā programmā kopā ar kapteini Maiklu Kvinnu. Viņš pamazām saprot, ka atrodas bīstama aizsega centrā.

programme.title: Izdzīvojusī
programme.desc: ASV Valsts departamenta darbiniece dodas komandējumā uz Londonu, lai novērstu teroristu iekļūšanu valstī, bet viss notiek ne tā, kā bija ieplānots. 2015. g.

programme.title: Cīņa par Losandželosu
programme.desc: ASV jūrnieku eskadrons kļūst par pēdējo aizsardzības līniju pret globālo invāziju. 2011.
